Package com.ibm.itim.policy

Provides a framework and an application programming interface for policy.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EntitlementInProvisioningPolicy
    This class holds information about an entitlement and its parent - the provisioning policy.

Package com.ibm.itim.policy Description

Provides a framework and an application programming interface for policy. The policy extensible framework and API has been developed to determine access to specific applications, systems, and resources based on various factors such as user roles, attributes, or groups

com.ibm.itim.policy refers to the configuration component that governs the enforcement of identity management policies within ISIM. This includes user account provisioning, role-based access control, password management, and lifecycle management. It helps ensure that access policies are consistently applied and that user accounts and access rights are in alignment with business and regulatory requirements.

com.ibm.itim.policy is often associated with the set of Java classes, interfaces, and resources that are responsible for managing, implementing, and enforcing identity and access management policies. These policies are typically defined at the application level to ensure that identity management practices—such as provisioning, access control, and password management—are aligned with business rules and security requirements.
